QueryDataSource.Name: dtDataSource
QueryDataSource.Sql: select 月份,nvl(sum(总收入),0) 总收入,nvl(sum(套餐外收入),0) 套餐外收入 from ( select decode(grouping_id(to_number(to_char(t.balance_date,'mm'))),0,to_number(to_char(t.balance_date,'mm'))||'月份','合计：') 月份, sum(case when trans_kind = '1' and t.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' then -cost else cost end) 总收入,0 套餐外收入 from fin_ipb_balancepay t where t.balance_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('&dtEndTime', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99 and '1010' = (select t3.dept_code from fin_ipr_inmaininfo t3 where t3.inpatient_no = (select t2.inpatient_no from fin_ipb_feeinfo t2 where t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and rownum = 1)) and t.pay_way not in ('PY','RC','PD','DC','CH') group by rollup((to_number(to_char(t.balance_date,'mm')))) union all select decode(grouping_id(to_number(to_char(t.balance_date,'mm'))),0,to_number(to_char(t.balance_date,'mm'))||'月份','合计：') time, 0,sum(t.cost) money from fin_ipb_balancepay t where t.balance_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('&dtEndTime', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99 and '1010' = (select t3.dept_code from fin_ipr_inmaininfo t3 where t3.inpatient_no = (select t2.inpatient_no from fin_ipb_feeinfo t2 where t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and rownum = 1)) and t.pay_way <> 'RC' and t.trans_kind = '1' group by rollup((to_number(to_char(t.balance_date,'mm')))) order by 月份 )t group by 月份 order by 月份

ReportQueryInfo.QueryFilePath: Report\住院护士长\月子中心实际总收入（按结算时间）设置.xml
